title: Valorisation of Food Waste with Distinct Carbon-to-Nitrogen Ratios by the Microalga Isochrysisgalbana: Laboratory Demonstration and Techno-Economic Assessment

The use of microorganisms to convert food waste into high-value products is a promising biorefinery approach for not only the reduction of food waste but also its recycling and valorisation....
